description:
I don’t know who needs to hear this but you are more than your degree.⁣
⁣
You are more than just a stay at home mom ⁣
⁣
You are more than just a homeschool mom⁣
⁣
You are more than just a work from home mom ⁣
⁣
Something that brought up so many feels for me the past few months was when people would ask if I was “still” a nurse practitioner. Like maybe that goes away if I’m not in a white coat in an office? ⁣
⁣
It honestly annoyed every time someone asked because I worked my ass off for that degree and the ability to write prescriptions and even though I don’t use it in the same capacity as what may be expected, doesn’t mean I no longer can. But regardless...⁣
⁣
Then I wondered why we feel as women so often that choosing against the grain, choosing to be at home, not being a “career” woman...why does that often have us feeling less than? Is it what society says we should be? Is it frowned upon in our social circles? Why do i feel so defensive?⁣
⁣
I run a million dollar business, I’m a six figure entrepreneur earner, and nothing about my life looks like I ever thought it would or should. And that’s ok. It’s great actually. And even if I didn’t have my nurse practitioner, I would still be enough. If i wasnt a work from home mom or not using my degree, it would be enough.⁣
⁣
I guess I’m letting you know today that those pieces of your life that nobody sees: they are worthy. You are worthy. You are deserving. No matter what society says. You teaching and raising your kids. It’s enough.⁣
⁣
𝑌𝑜𝑢 𝑎𝑟𝑒 𝑑𝑜𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑎 𝑔𝑜𝑜𝑑, 𝑔𝑜𝑜𝑑 𝑗𝑜𝑏 𝑚𝑎𝑚𝑎.
.
.
.
.
#youareenough 
#wellnessjourney
#idahomom 
#positivityisthekey 
#womenempowermentquotes 
#femaleownedbusiness 
#younglivingbusiness 
#nursesofig 
#medicalfreedomactivist 
#femaleentrepreneurs
